price: 31. Le verdict de notre Seigneur s’est donc accompli contre nous, et nous allons certainement goûter (le supplice).
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
